section.title: Release process
section.p: SimpleTest is now in "maintenace mode" only.
It means we consider SimpleTest to be really stable. And that each new release will add bug-fixes only.
Of course we'll follow closely all new versions of PHP, and hopefully release a new version each time a newer version breaks something !
